name: Victor Voidbringer
description:
Victor Voidbringer

Victor Voidbringer was once a powerful warrior, but he met his demise in battle.

Desperate to prolong his life, he made a pact with death itself. In exchange for prolonging his life, , Victor must harvest the souls of other warriors by taking their weapons.

As a result, Victor has become a feared figure, feared for his ability to steal the souls of brave warriors and his own immortality. Despite his fearsome reputation, Victor is forever bound to his pact with death, unable to escape his duty to collect the souls of warriors for eternity.

Controls

Movement: W/A/S/D

Sprint: Shift

Mouse click: Attack
